last_episode_to_air.name: Stay Tuned
last_episode_to_air.overview: Finally free from Jack's head, the weary gang reinhabits their bodies only to learn that — surprise, surprise — the battle is far from over.

name: The Last Kids on Earth
overview: Young teenager Jack Sullivan and a group of friends live in a decked-out tree house, playing video games, eating candy, and fighting zombies in the aftermath of a monster apocalypse.

episodes.name: The Last Kids on Earth
episodes.overview: Living solo in his monster-infested town, 13-year-old Jack will have to think fast, find friends and get creative if he wants to survive.

episodes.name: Mall Quest
episodes.overview: Fed up with his friends' bickering, Jack hopes a quest to the mall will get the buds back on good terms - because this is going this is getting annoying

episodes.name: Jack the Slayer
episodes.overview: Jack’s attempts to impress his monstrous new pals upsets June, Quint and Dirk, who feel like he’s taking all the credit.

episodes.name: Bestiary Master
episodes.overview: Feeling useless when it comes to the fine art of fighting monsters, Quint sets out to prove himself to his friends.

episodes.name: The Zombie Parade
episodes.overview: While exploring a graveyard, Jack and Quint get emotional — really emotional. Meanwhile, June and Dirk find they have a lot in common. Oh, the horror!

episodes.name: The Thrull of Victory
episodes.overview: While Thrull trains Jack to go after monsters and zombies with a new attitude, Quint and Dirk dig through trash — and June follows a hunch.

episodes.name: Stay on Target
episodes.overview: Quint, Dirk and June are pumped for their up-all-night zombie stakeout. But Jack's running late ... and he's supposed to bring the snacks.

episodes.name: June Gloom
episodes.overview: When the gang visits June's old house, Jack assumes it'll be a fun walk down memory lane. Never assume, Jack. Never assume.

episodes.name: Follow That Butler
episodes.overview: After adding another monster to the bestiary, Jack, June, Quint and Dirk learn a troubling truth: Their work is far from over.

episodes.name: Always Darkest
episodes.overview: Jack's vow to never trust another monster is put to the test. Quint, Dirk and June look to acquire a little — well, actually a lot — of weed killer.

episodes.name: Dawn of Rezzoch
episodes.overview: Quint's been captured, Rezzoch's on a rampage and Jack's got a wish: to put an end to all of this mayhem, once and for all.

episodes.name: Energy Crisis
episodes.overview: Desperate for a reliable energy source, Jack, June, Quint and Dirk head to the planetarium, where a generator awaits — along with something else.

episodes.name: Zombies Killed the Radio Star
episodes.overview: The gang makes a stunning discovery at a fire station, Jack falls head over heels for a video game, and June has an urge to communicate.

episodes.name: Tournament of the Dead
episodes.overview: Feeling June, Quint and Dirk need to stop working so hard, Jack convinces his pals to take part in an over-the-top tournament with the monsters.

episodes.name: Nightmare King
episodes.overview: Jack and the gang close in on a much-needed antenna for their radio. Meanwhile, June, Quint and Dirk experience odd visions of a dark future.

episodes.name: Junkyard Jack
episodes.overview: As Jack's anxiety about the future continues to grow, he and June share a moment atop a giant heap of garbage (it's nicer than it sounds).

episodes.name: Tunnel Vision
episodes.overview: Jack sets out to confront the Wretch, June gets on Quint's nerves, and Dirk learns of an unappetizing third test to become an honorary monster.

episodes.name: Zom-B-Goners
episodes.overview: Everyone leaps into action when an exhausted Quint discovers that his zom-b-gone torches are offline. Meanwhile, Dirk is forced to team up with Chef.

episodes.name: Funland
episodes.overview: Jack convinces June, Quint and Dirk to go to an amusement park, where the friends quickly discover they aren't the only ones there.

episodes.name: Belly of the Beast
episodes.overview: After Rezzoch pulls Jack into an alternate realm, Bardle transports June, Quint and Dirk in hopes they can save him before it's too late.

episodes.name: Stay Tuned
episodes.overview: Finally free from Jack's head, the weary gang reinhabits their bodies only to learn that — surprise, surprise — the battle is far from over.
